00053 struct InplaceSolverIslandCallbackMt : public btSimulationIslandManagerMt::IslandCallback
00054 {
00055         btContactSolverInfo*    m_solverInfo;
00056         btConstraintSolver*             m_solver;
00057         btIDebugDraw*                   m_debugDrawer;
00058         btDispatcher*                   m_dispatcher;
00059 
00060         InplaceSolverIslandCallbackMt(
00061                 btConstraintSolver*     solver,
00062                 btStackAlloc* stackAlloc,
00063                 btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00064                 :m_solverInfo(NULL),
00065                 m_solver(solver),
00066                 m_debugDrawer(NULL),
00067                 m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00068         {
00069 
00070         }
00071 
00072         InplaceSolverIslandCallbackMt& operator=(InplaceSolverIslandCallbackMt& other)
00073         {
00074                 btAssert(0);
00075                 (void)other;
00076                 return *this;
00077         }
00078 
00079         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setup ( btContactSolverInfo* solverInfo, btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer)
00080         {
00081                 btAssert(solverInfo);
00082                 m_solverInfo = solverInfo;
00083                 m_debugDrawer = debugDrawer;
00084         }
00085 
00086 
00087         virtual void    processIsland( btCollisionObject** bodies,
00088                                    int numBodies,
00089                                    btPersistentManifold** manifolds,
00090                                    int numManifolds,
00091                                    btTypedConstraint** constraints,
00092                                    int numConstraints,
00093                                    int islandId
00094                                    )
00095         {
00096         m_solver->solveGroup( bodies,
00097                               numBodies,
00098                               manifolds,
00099                               numManifolds,
00100                               constraints,
00101                               numConstraints,
00102                               *m_solverInfo,
00103                               m_debugDrawer,
00104                               m_dispatcher
00105                               );
00106     }
00107 
00108 };

00114 
00115 btConstraintSolverPoolMt::ThreadSolver* btConstraintSolverPoolMt::getAndLockThreadSolver()
00116 {
00117     int i = 0;
00118 #if BT_THREADSAFE
00119     i = btGetCurrentThreadIndex() % m_solvers.size();
00120 #endif // #if BT_THREADSAFE
00121     while ( true )
00122     {
00123         ThreadSolver& solver = m_solvers[ i ];
00124         if ( solver.mutex.tryLock() )
00125         {
00126             return &solver;
00127         }
00128         // failed, try the next one
00129         i = ( i + 1 ) % m_solvers.size();
00130     }
00131     return NULL;
00132 }
00133 
00134 void btConstraintSolverPoolMt::init( btConstraintSolver** solvers, int numSolvers )
00135 {
00136     m_solverType = BT_SEQUENTIAL_IMPULSE_SOLVER;
00137     m_solvers.resize( numSolvers );
00138     for ( int i = 0; i < numSolvers; ++i )
00139     {
00140         m_solvers[ i ].solver = solvers[ i ];
00141     }
00142     if ( numSolvers > 0 )
00143     {
00144         m_solverType = solvers[ 0 ]->getSolverType();
00145     }
00146 }
00147 
00148 // create the solvers for me
00149 btConstraintSolverPoolMt::btConstraintSolverPoolMt( int numSolvers )
00150 {
00151     btAlignedObjectArray<btConstraintSolver*> solvers;
00152     solvers.reserve( numSolvers );
00153     for ( int i = 0; i < numSolvers; ++i )
00154     {
00155         btConstraintSolver* solver = new btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver();
00156         solvers.push_back( solver );
00157     }
00158     init( &solvers[ 0 ], numSolvers );
00159 }
00160 
00161 // pass in fully constructed solvers (destructor will delete them)
00162 btConstraintSolverPoolMt::btConstraintSolverPoolMt( btConstraintSolver** solvers, int numSolvers )
00163 {
00164     init( solvers, numSolvers );
00165 }
00166 
00167 btConstraintSolverPoolMt::~btConstraintSolverPoolMt()
00168 {
00169     // delete all solvers
00170     for ( int i = 0; i < m_solvers.size(); ++i )
00171     {
00172         ThreadSolver& solver = m_solvers[ i ];
00173         delete solver.solver;
00174         solver.solver = NULL;
00175     }
00176 }
00177 
00179 btScalar btConstraintSolverPoolMt::solveGroup( btCollisionObject** bodies,
00180     int numBodies,
00181     btPersistentManifold** manifolds,
00182     int numManifolds,
00183     btTypedConstraint** constraints,
00184     int numConstraints,
00185     const btContactSolverInfo& info,
00186     btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer,
00187     btDispatcher* dispatcher
00188 )
00189 {
00190     ThreadSolver* ts = getAndLockThreadSolver();
00191     ts->solver->solveGroup( bodies, numBodies, manifolds, numManifolds, constraints, numConstraints, info, debugDrawer, dispatcher );
00192     ts->mutex.unlock();
00193     return 0.0f;
00194 }
00195 
00196 void btConstraintSolverPoolMt::reset()
00197 {
00198     for ( int i = 0; i < m_solvers.size(); ++i )
00199     {
00200         ThreadSolver& solver = m_solvers[ i ];
00201         solver.mutex.lock();
00202         solver.solver->reset();
00203         solver.mutex.unlock();
00204     }
00205 }

00211 
00212 btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt::btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt(btDispatcher* dispatcher, btBroadphaseInterface* pairCache, btConstraintSolverPoolMt* constraintSolver, btCollisionConfiguration* collisionConfiguration)
00213 : btDiscreteDynamicsWorld(dispatcher,pairCache,constraintSolver,collisionConfiguration)
00214 {
00215         if (m_ownsIslandManager)
00216         {
00217                 m_islandManager->~btSimulationIslandManager();
00218                 btAlignedFree( m_islandManager);
00219         }
00220     {
00221                 void* mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(InplaceSolverIslandCallbackMt),16);
00222                 m_solverIslandCallbackMt = new (mem) InplaceSolverIslandCallbackMt (m_constraintSolver, 0, dispatcher);
00223     }
00224         {
00225                 void* mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btSimulationIslandManagerMt),16);
00226                 btSimulationIslandManagerMt* im = new (mem) btSimulationIslandManagerMt();
00227         im->setMinimumSolverBatchSize( m_solverInfo.m_minimumSolverBatchSize );
00228         m_islandManager = im;
00229         }
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00233 btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt::~btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt()
00234 {
00235         if (m_solverIslandCallbackMt)
00236         {
00237                 m_solverIslandCallbackMt->~InplaceSolverIslandCallbackMt();
00238                 btAlignedFree(m_solverIslandCallbackMt);
00239         }
00240         if (m_ownsConstraintSolver)
00241         {
00242                 m_constraintSolver->~btConstraintSolver();
00243                 btAlignedFree(m_constraintSolver);
00244         }
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00248 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt::solveConstraints(btContactSolverInfo& solverInfo)
00249 {
00250         BT_PROFILE("solveConstraints");
00251 
00252         m_solverIslandCallbackMt->setup(&solverInfo, getDebugDrawer());
00253         m_constraintSolver->prepareSolve(getCollisionWorld()->getNumCollisionObjects(), getCollisionWorld()->getDispatcher()->getNumManifolds());
00254 
00256     btSimulationIslandManagerMt* im = static_cast<btSimulationIslandManagerMt*>(m_islandManager);
00257     im->buildAndProcessIslands( getCollisionWorld()->getDispatcher(), getCollisionWorld(), m_constraints, m_solverIslandCallbackMt );
00258 
00259         m_constraintSolver->allSolved(solverInfo, m_debugDrawer);
00260 }

00263 struct UpdaterUnconstrainedMotion : public btIParallelForBody
00264 {
00265     btScalar timeStep;
00266     btRigidBody** rigidBodies;
00267 
00268     void forLoop( int iBegin, int iEnd ) const BT_OVERRIDE
00269     {
00270         for ( int i = iBegin; i < iEnd; ++i )
00271         {
00272             btRigidBody* body = rigidBodies[ i ];
00273             if ( !body->isStaticOrKinematicObject() )
00274             {
00275                 //don't integrate/update velocities here, it happens in the constraint solver
00276                 body->applyDamping( timeStep );
00277                 body->predictIntegratedTransform( timeStep, body->getInterpolationWorldTransform() );
00278             }
00279         }
00280     }
00281 };
00282 
00283 
00284 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt::predictUnconstraintMotion( btScalar timeStep )
00285 {
00286     BT_PROFILE( "predictUnconstraintMotion" );
00287     if ( m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size() > 0 )
00288     {
00289         UpdaterUnconstrainedMotion update;
00290         update.timeStep = timeStep;
00291         update.rigidBodies = &m_nonStaticRigidBodies[ 0 ];
00292         int grainSize = 50;  // num of iterations per task for task scheduler
00293         btParallelFor( 0, m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size(), grainSize, update );
00294     }
00295 }
00296 
00297 
00298 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt::createPredictiveContacts( btScalar timeStep )
00299 {
00300     BT_PROFILE( "createPredictiveContacts" );
00301     releasePredictiveContacts();
00302     if ( m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size() > 0 )
00303     {
00304         UpdaterCreatePredictiveContacts update;
00305         update.world = this;
00306         update.timeStep = timeStep;
00307         update.rigidBodies = &m_nonStaticRigidBodies[ 0 ];
00308         int grainSize = 50;  // num of iterations per task for task scheduler
00309         btParallelFor( 0, m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size(), grainSize, update );
00310     }
00311 }
00312 
00313 
00314 void btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt::integrateTransforms( btScalar timeStep )
00315 {
00316     BT_PROFILE( "integrateTransforms" );
00317     if ( m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size() > 0 )
00318     {
00319         UpdaterIntegrateTransforms update;
00320         update.world = this;
00321         update.timeStep = timeStep;
00322         update.rigidBodies = &m_nonStaticRigidBodies[ 0 ];
00323         int grainSize = 50;  // num of iterations per task for task scheduler
00324         btParallelFor( 0, m_nonStaticRigidBodies.size(), grainSize, update );
00325     }
00326 }
